section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest
goals__remit:
LVNL – Air traffic Control the Netherlands (LVNL) provides air navigation services for Amsterdam International Airport Schiphol, Rotterdam the Hague Airport, two 2 regional airports and en-route traffic. 
Each year our highly professional air traffic controllers handle all movements safely and efficiently in the Dutch airspace, up to flight level 245. The purpose of LVNL is to: ‘Jointly facilitating aviation’
